title: Impurity that would lower percent C in glucose

content.prompt: The mass percent of carbon in pure glucose, C6H12O6, is 40.0 percent. A chemist analyzes an impure sample of glucose and determines that the mass percent of carbon is 38.2 percent. Which of the following impurities could account for the low mass percent of carbon in the sample?

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
